WGUS83 KLBF 011639
FLSLBF

FLOOD ADVISORY
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE NORTH PLATTE NE
1039 AM CST THU JAN 1 2015

NEC111-081900-
/O.EXT.KLBF.FA.Y.0029.000000T0000Z-150108T1900Z/
/00000.N.IJ.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
LINCOLN NE-
1039 AM CST THU JAN 1 2015

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN NORTH PLATTE HAS EXTENDED THE

* FLOOD ADVISORY FOR ICE JAM FLOODING IN...
  CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NEBRASKA...

* UNTIL 100 PM CST THURSDAY JANUARY 8TH

* MINOR FLOODING CONTINUES ALONG THE SOUTH PLATTE RIVER EAST OF 
NORTH PLATTE. AN ICE JAM HAS CAUSED THE SOUTH PLATTE RIVER TO BACK 
UP AND RISE OUT OF THE RIVER BANK IN AREAS EAST OF THE CITY OF NORTH 
PLATTE...IN THE VICINITY OF NEWBERRY ACCESS ROAD AND THE IRON EAGLE 
GOLF COURSE. THE MINOR FLOODING WILL BE LIMITED TO LOW LYING AREAS 
ALONG THE RIVER. COLD TEMPERATURES ARE FORECAST THROUGH THE NEXT 
WEEK WHICH SHOULD KEEP THE ICE JAM IN PLACE AND KEEP RIVER LEVELS 
ELEVATED.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

TO REPORT FLOODING...HAVE THE NEAREST LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY RELAY
YOUR REPORT TO THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE FORECAST OFFICE IN NORTH
PLATTE.

&&

LAT...LON 4112 10059 4103 10060 4104 10075 4113 10074

$$

BROOKS
